WRITING.TITLE: ELI5: Is it possible to have serotonin in powder/food form? Then all we have to do is drink/sniff it and become instantly happy?
My partner loves Idris Elba, how can she meet him?

WRITING.TEXT: Ronaldinho's INSANE pass to Guily (who scored) vs AC Milan. Bet nobody even remembers it. Super hard to find, but it was unbelievable.

Tt's due to reptiles receptors having a higher level of heat sensors than pain sensors. The pain receptors are poorly developed because, during evolution, objects hot enough to burn are uncommon in the wild and such receptors therefore aren't needed. One would then lack a burn/pain withdrawal reflex.] A humans pain receptors are a lot better evolved. We would scream and jump/move around due to that much pain (albeit our adrenaline would try to get us out of there and therefore we may feel less pain) But you get the idea.
